title: Roasted Baked Salmon with quinoa and wild rice
description: Delicious dinner option with balanced nutrition for gestational diabetes
instructions: Prepare all ingredients and preheat oven to 375°F if baking.
Season salmon with salt, pepper, and herbs.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until fish flakes easily.
Prepare quinoa and wild rice as desired.
Plate the main protein with sides.
Garnish as desired and serve hot.
